Package automata

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DA<Symbol,Acceptance extends AcceptanceOmega>
    Class to store a deterministic automata of some acceptance type Acceptance.
    DASimplifyAcceptance  
    HOAF2DA
    A HOAConsumer for jhoafparser that constructs a prism.DA from the parsed automaton.
    LTL2DA
    Infrastructure for constructing deterministic automata for LTL formulas.
    LTL2NBA
    Infrastructure for constructing non-deterministic Büchi automata for LTL formulas.
    LTL2RabinLibrary
    LTL-to-DRA conversion via hard-coded DRA for special formulas direct translation into DRA for simple path formulas with temporal bounds
    LTL2RabinLibrary.OperandInfo
    Helper class for storing info about an operand of a simple Until formula: Can be either TRUE, FALSE, a label or a negated label
    LTL2WDBA
    Construction of weak Deterministic Büchi Automata for a fragment of LTL, based on the algorithm presented in Christian Dax, Jochen Eisinger, Felix Klaedtke: "Mechanizing the Powerset Construction for Restricted Classes of omega-Automata", ATVA 2007, LNCS 4762.
    LTL2WDBA.BuchiLTS  
    LTL2WDBA.Lasso
    A lasso, i.e., an infinite word uw^omega
    LTL2WDBA.LassoLTSState  
    LTL2WDBA.PowersetDA
    Storage for a DA resulting from the powerset construction on an NBA;
    LTSFromDA
    Class giving access to the labelled transition system (LTS) underlying a deterministic automaton (DA).

    Exception Description
